item.description:
We REALLY need to have another meetup. It's been ages! And food is always a great reason to get together! We've been to Rasoi in the past and the food is really good! Here's the write-up from the website: 

SATURDAY’S VEGAN BRUNCH – $11.99

This lunch buffet is gluten free and our chefs prepare a variety of choices from the cuisines of India. The highlight of this lunch buffet is masala dosa crepe stuffed with seasoned potatoes and folded like a burrito. The menu is designed keeping in mind the principles of Ayurveda.

 

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask the waitstaff. Or look for us from our profile pictures.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Vegan Brunch Buffet at Rasoi in Pawtucket
